title: The State of Destiny 2 - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.30.17
description:
Andrea and Greg run through Bungie's message to the community and talk about the future of the title.

Thanks to Leesa for sponsoring this episode. Go to https://Leesa.com/KindaFunny and use promo code: KindaFunny and get $100 off

Thanks to Omaha Steaks for sponsoring this episode. Go to https://OmahaSteaks.com and use promo code: KFGAMES in the search bar, and get a 75% saving

00:02:22 - Housekeeping\Final Day to Get the KF Christmas Card on Patreon
Vote trending gamer
PSX Pimping
The Roper Report   -
00:05:24 - The State of Destiny 2 Blog Post
00:20:10 - As just announced by Geoff Keighley, The Game Awards will be premiering the first-ever gameplay of the new desert map from PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds.
00:20:24 - ASHLEY BURCH and Hannah Telle Reprise Roles in Life if Strange: Before the Storm
00:23:27 - Super Mario Cereal in stores 12/11
00:24:13 - Ex-Riot Guys (and ex-Naughty Dog guy) Start new studio, “story and play” studio
00:25:09 -Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp is getting a makeover for the holidays. Nintendo announced today that the mobile game will feature a limited-time event that'll let you decorate your camp for the holidays.
00:26:10 - The official list of upcoming games
 Reader mail   -
00:32:12 - Will Zelda BOTW: Champions Ballad be announced at the Game Awards? - Lorenzo Von Matterhorn
00:34:34 - Black Friday sales! - Astrocreep
00:37:28 - PlayStation Plus so worth it! - Liam Briddock
00:41:50 - youtube monetization and the future of Kinda Funny? - Eric C
00:50:07 - Squad Up - David M: Cropsey#11233(PC)
00:51:15- You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host:Tim

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
